GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
kcm: close race conditions on sk_receive_queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit d9ad4de92e184b19bcae4da10dac0275abf83931, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kcm: close race conditions on sk_receive_queue
